Biography

Hi, my name is matt!

Interests and Hobbies

I like geeky stuff like coding and gaming. However, I also enjoy outdoor activities like sky diving, off-roading, and shooting sports.

Goals and Aspirations

My goals are to fly helicopters in the United States Army, and one day raise a family with the love of my life, Katie Conely.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Q: What was SERE school like?

    A: Well.. if I told you, I could lose my clearance.. so sorry.

  • Q: Can you fix my computer?

    A: Just because I am majoring in computer science does not mean that I have an omnicient view of potential issue that any computer might have.. it's a little more complex than that.

  • Q: What is wrong with my computer?

    A: I am not God. So I really can't answer that until I've done more than 2 seconds of looking into it.
